title: Light Weight
solution:
Weigh 1

Weigh 123 and 456

  • If even go to Weigh 2a
  • If left is lighter go to Weigh 2b
  • If right is lighter go to Weigh 2c

Weigh 2a

Weigh 7 and 8 to find lightest

Weigh 2b

Weigh 1 and 2 to find lightest, if even 3 is lightest

Weigh 2c

Weigh 4 and 5 to find lightest, if even 6 is lightest
